title: Native mobile or tablet - connection details
mainAdvice: Answer the following questions about your mobile or tablet based Solution
additionalAdvice: This information will be visible to buyers on your Solution page.

minimum-connection-speed.mainAdvice: Select the minimum connection speed required for your Solution to function? (optional)
minimum-connection-speed.additionalAdvice: Please select below the minimum bandwidth requirement.

connection-types.additionalAdvice: Please select below all the connection types your solution supports

connection-requirements-description.additionalAdvice: Add further description of connectivity for your Solution.
connection-requirements-description.footerAdvice: You can enter up to 300 characters

errorResponse.maxLength: Additional information is over the character limit
